SELECT l.lecture_name, pn.title, pn.submitdate, pn.notice_no, header FROM student_lecture sl JOIN lecture l on sl.lecture_no = l.lecture_no and sl.student_no = #{student_no} JOIN professor_notice pn on l.lecture_no = pn.lecture_no
UNION ALL
SELECT l.lecture_name, lf.file_name, lf.file_time, lf.no, header FROM student_lecture sl JOIN lecture l on sl.lecture_no = l.lecture_no and sl.student_no = #{student_no} JOIN lecturefile lf on l.lecture_no = lf.lecture_no
ORDER BY submitdate DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{pagination.sz}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT l.lecture_name, pn.title, pn.submitdate FROM student_lecture sl JOIN lecture l on sl.lecture_no = l.lecture_no and sl.student_no = #{student_no} JOIN professor_notice pn on l.lecture_no = pn.lecture_no
UNION ALL
SELECT l.lecture_name, lf.file_name, lf.file_time FROM student_lecture sl JOIN lecture l on sl.lecture_no = l.lecture_no and sl.student_no = #{student_no} JOIN lecturefile lf on l.lecture_no = lf.lecture_no
ORDER BY submitdate DESC ) AS tem

SELECT l.lecture_name, sn.title, sn.submitdate, sn.studentnotice_no, header FROM professor_lecture fl JOIN lecture l on fl.lecture_no = l.lecture_no and fl.professor_no = ${professor_no} JOIN student_notice sn on l.lecture_no = sn.lecture_no
ORDER BY submitdate DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT l.lecture_name, sn.title, sn.submitdate, sn.studentnotice_no, header FROM professor_lecture fl JOIN lecture l on fl.lecture_no = l.lecture_no and fl.professor_no = ${professor_no} JOIN student_notice sn on l.lecture_no = sn.lecture_no
ORDER BY submitdate DESC ) AS tem
